dublin_core.dcvalue: Yasmin Chandani, Project Director, JSI Research & Training Institute, Inc., Email: ychandani@jsi.com

cStock is now the community level logistics management information system (LMIS) for Malawi, used for reporting and resupply system for over 3,000 community health workers across the country. cStock has played a critical role in making medicines consistently available for effective child health and family planning services.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:23Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 cstock_v5.pdf: 159972 bytes, checksum: 81fc30bfa0e57a7f69a23f09bc89e555 (MD5)
Supply Chains for Community Case Management (cStock)

Data collection and reporting, Supply chain management, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Primary care, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
